feed.title: FishStalkers VIP
feed.subtitle: An interdisciplinary team dedicated to using machine learning to connect observed behavior with brain function.

entry.title: Team Formation
entry.content:
If you are looking for a VIP this semester and are interested in the fields of Biology, Computer Science, or Math then look no further. In this project you will work collaboratively with a team of people within your respective fields and learn to tackle problems that arise within this project. This hands-on project will equip you with valuable skills and knowledge, as well as enhance your resume with research experience.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this VIP please reach out to bshi42@gatech.edu
